string.text: Nemiroff Vodka

Nemiroff is a Ukrainian producer of alcoholic beverages, based in the town of Nemyriv in the Vinnytska oblast. Specializing in vodkas and other spirits, they are considered one of the best vodkas in the world and by extension, in the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol
Putinka Vodka

Triple purification, a smooth texture and a unique taste. Following the tradition of naming vodka brands after Russian leaders, Putinka first went into production after Vladimir Putin was elected president. Produced in Russia from the finest grain and crystal clear water from Siberian springs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol
Stolichnaya Vodka

A high quality Russian vodka made of wheat and rye grain. A Russian favorite, "Stoli" is quite popular and widely available within the zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol
Ukrainian Beer

Ukrainian beer. Another popular beverage in the Zone, besides vodka.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol
Cheap Vodka

Metal bottle containing a portion of what seems to be Zone-produced vodka. The fumes are strong and the quality is lacking but it gets the job done.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol
Altoids

Mint-flavoured Altoids imported from outside the Zone. Highly refreshing.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Baked Beans

Canned baked beans brought from outside the Zone. For some, these haricot beans in tomato sauce may bring back nice memories.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Beef Tushonka

Tushonka is a common name of canned, stewed meat produced in the Soviet Union and other Warsaw Pact countries. It has become a primary means of long-time meat preservation, used both by the civilian population and as a standard-issue Red Army food ration. Tushonka is known for its high nutrition value and relatively good taste.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Bread Loaf

A loaf of bread. Surprisingly fresh suggesting that it was recently baked somewhere within the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Can of Tuna

Canned tuna in oil, imported from outside the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Canned Corn

Canned sweet corn imported from outside the Zone. Can be eaten as is, but there are some who use it as a soup ingredient.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Canned Tomatoes

Canned, sliced and diced tomatoes are imported to the Zone on a regular basis. The best before date on the bottom suggests they're still fresh.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Chili Beans

Canned chili beans imported from outside the Zone. Hardy and delicious, it is often used as an ingredient in some stalker dishes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Chocolate Protein Bar

This bar provides the body with necessary proteins and sugars provide a welcome boost in energy. Useful on longer trips when you're on the go and need to eat something fast.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Doctor's Sausage

This sausage was originally intended to be a dietary supplement for people exhibiting signs of prolonged starvation. Because it was a mild-tasting, inexpensive and relatively healthy source of meat, Doctor's Sausage became very popular in the USSR.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Mixed Nuts

Assorted peanuts, hazelnuts, cashews and almonds. Nutrition value is quite high. Imported from South Africa.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Raisins

A pack of raisins. Rich in nutrients. A good snack for the road.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Russian Chocolate

Russian chocolate. Very rare in the Zone and quite valuable even though its taste is nothing special. Brings back many fond childhood memories, which may help soothe the pain of living in the harsh and unforgiving conditions of the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Russian Chocolate (Half-consumed)

Russian chocolate. Half the bar is missing. Very rare in the Zone and quite valuable even though its taste is nothing special. Brings back many fond childhood memories, which may help soothe the pain of living in the harsh and unforgiving conditions of the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Smoked Salmon

Ukrainian smoked salmon. As soon as it's brought to the Zone, the fish changes hands until it finds its way to the highest bidder. Very valuable.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Smoked Sausage

Sausage made of beef and pork. Smoked and vacuum packaged, it can be preserved for long periods of time. This particular piece has been imported from the Russian Federation. Cherish for its exceptional flavour.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Bread Loaf (Stale)

A stale loaf of bread. Better than nothing, albeit a bit hard.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Food
Beard's Tea

Beard's popular hot tea made from a mixture of sugar, edible dried mushrooms and boiled water that is said to be radiation-free. Stalkers who can afford to buy the drink often take it for long trips in the Zone. It's a good and healthy way to stay on your toes when you're getting tired or when you're out exploring on cold nights.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Energy Drink

Often used by stalkers on long trips due to its sugar and caffeine content. Also will help sober up if drank, as well as induce the release of adrenaline into the bloodstream.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Flask (Purified Water)

Flask filled with purified water.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
Mineral Water

Calcium-infused carbonated mineral water from Ukrainian springs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Sparkling Water

Sparkling water for thirsty stalkers. Refreshing with a bite of carbonation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Tea "The Beak"

"The Beak" is a powerful mixture of Zone-produced vodka and pulverized beak of a black crow. Not every beak can be used as an ingredient, because only black male crows that have lived in the Zone for more than 15 years have mutated sufficiently. Rumour has it that such beaks contain a form of enriched protein that cleanses moderate amounts of radiation from the body. Some even say that drinking "The Beak" makes you feel like you have wings for a few seconds. On the downside however, its taste is awful.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol
MRE

The Meal, Ready-to-Eat (commonly known as the MRE) is a self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging, developed by the United States military for its service members for use in combat or other field conditions where organized food facilities are not available. The packaging of an MRE is designed to withstand rough conditions and exposure to the elements. Contains one course along with a variety of other food and drink items.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Russian IRP-B Combat Ration

Breakfast, dinner and supper all in one package. Includes various food items whose function is to provide the body with all minerals and micro-elements essential for your health as well as cooking equipment (small metal frame, fuel tablets, matches, striker) and other items (e.g. napkins) facilitating use in field conditions. Comes with a polymeric box that protects the ingredients from hazardous environmental conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Ukrainian Combat Ration

This Ukrainian combat ration is based on a previous Russian version, and comprises commercially available cans and dried food items packed together in a sectioned box (resembling a takeout tray) made of very thin green plastic. Contains all that is necessary to provide a healthy adult with all calories and minerals needed during a single day.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Cigarettes (Lucky Strike)

American cigarettes imported from outside the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Cigarettes (Marlboro)

American cigarettes imported from outside the Zone. They are somewhat rare in the Zone and are therefore quite valuable.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Cigarettes (Russian)

The cheapest pack of cigarettes in the Zone. Russian budget brand.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Cigarettes (Soviet)

A pack of budget, strong cigarettes of average quality. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant

Cuban Cigar

This valuable Cuban cigar can bring bliss for a short while, especially when admiring a nice sunset. Cuban cigars are considered the finest in the world. A rare commodity.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Hand-rolling Tobacco

Precious hand-rolling tobacco, imported from the West. With no additional ingredients, it's possible to enjoy the original taste of the tobacco leaf.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
Russian Tobacco

Cigarettes are expensive and rare in the Zone and having raw tobacco enables you to produce your own cigarettes at a lower cost. This tin is sealed, which ensures that the tobacco will stay fresh for days or weeks depending on the conditions it's kept in.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
